feat.value: An old anchorite had a servant living in a village.
And it happened one time
that he delayed going to the elder according to his custom.
And the elder lacked all the necessities
and the handiwork which he had in his cell.
And it bothered him that he did not have anything to do,
and he did not have food.
And he said to his disciple,
“Do you want to go and summon the one who serves us?”
And he said,
“I will do what you command.”
And yet the elder did not dare to send the disciple.
When they had continued to be constrained,
the servant did not come to them.
The elder said to the brother,
“Do you want to go to the village?”
The brother said,
“I will do what you command.”
The brother was afraid to go to the village because of scandal
And yet in order not to disobey his father,
he determined to go.
He said to him,
“Go, and I believe in God completely,”
that …
in every temptation.
And he prayed and sent him.
When he went into the village,
he went to the place where the servant lived.
He found him and all his household
away from the village because of a memorial
except for only a young girl belonging to him.
When he knocked on the door,
she replied and opened it.
He asked for her father.
But she entreated him
and she drew him in.
but he did not endure it.
But when she had compelled him by force,
she touched him
and drew him in.
As for him, when he realized
that it was for defilement that she was drawing him in,
he groaned and cried out
“Lord, save me in this hour because of the prayers of my father.”
And when he had said this,
instantly he found himself beside the river going to the monastery.
And he was taken safely to his father.
